title: Replace config system for CoreCLR
body: Investigate what is need to replace the configuration system. No registry at all on CoreCLR, but should probably be still there for running on Windows.

nodes.body: Currently it looks like there really isn't much needed from the app.config. Binding redirects aren't needed or supported in CoreCLR and the tools version can be solved by always using ".". We will probably want to re-evaluate this again after Sprint 90.
